Package org.svvrl.goal.core.wiki

Interface Block

All Superinterfaces:
Markup
All Known Implementing Classes:
Blocks, DefinitionList, Description, Headline, HTMLBlock, InlineBlock, Link, Newline, OrderedList, Paragraph, PlainNewline, Preformatted, Term, Unformatted, UnorderedList
public interface Block
extends Markup
This interface defines block elements.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Method Details

    • getPlain

      java.lang.String getPlain​(int indent, int width)
      Renders this markup as a plain text.
      Parameters:
      indent - the indent of every line of this block
      width - the width of this block
      Returns:
      the plain text of this markup
